headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for devices using the miot protocol
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [README](https://github.com/merdok/homebridge-miot#platform-configuration-fields)

ip.title: Device ip address
ip.description: The ip address of the device.

deviceId.title: Device id
deviceId.description: The device id of the device.

model.title: The device model
model.description: The model of the device. Should only be specified when certain about the device model. If specified then the accessory will be created instantly without the need to first discover and identify the device.

prefsDir.title: Prefs directory
prefsDir.description: The location where to store device information. Default is: ~/.homebridge/.xiaomiMiot

pollingInterval.title: Background polling interval
pollingInterval.description: How often to check the status of the device in seconds.

deepDebugLog.title: Enable deep debug log
deepDebugLog.description: Enables additional more detailed debug log. Useful when trying to figure out issues with the plugin.

buzzerControl.title: Buzzer control service
buzzerControl.description: Whether to show buzzer control buttons.

childLockControl.title: Control the child lock
childLockControl.description: Shows a switch on the device accessory which control the child lock.

ledControl.title: Led control service
ledControl.description: Whether to show led control buttons.

horizontalSwingControl.title: Horizontal swing control service
horizontalSwingControl.description: Shows an additional switch to quickly enable/disable horizontal swing mode.

verticalSwingControl.title: Vertical swing control service
verticalSwingControl.description: Shows a switch to enable/disable vertical swing mode.

moveControl.title: Move control service
moveControl.description: Whether to show switches which allows to move the fan left, right, up or down.

fanLevelControl.title: Fan level service
fanLevelControl.description: Show fan level switches which allow to change the fan level.

ioniserControl.title: Ioniser control service
ioniserControl.description: Show a switch which allows to quickly enable/disable the ioniser on your fan.

shutdownTimer.title: Shutdown timer service
shutdownTimer.description: Show a slider (light bulb) to control the auto shutdown timer.

horizontalAngleButtons.title: Horizontal angle buttons
horizontalAngleButtons.description: Allows to create buttons that can switch between horizontal oscillation angles.

heatLevelControl.title: Heat level service
heatLevelControl.description: Show heat level switches which allow to change the heat level.

screenControl.title: Screen control service
screenControl.description: Whether to show led control buttons.

dryControl.title: Dry control service
dryControl.description: Whether to show a dry control button.

modeControl.title: Mode control service
modeControl.description: Show mode switches which allow to change the device mode.

lightModeControl.title: Light mode control service
lightModeControl.description: Show light mode switches which allow to change the light mode.

lightShutdownTimer.title: Light shutdown timer service
lightShutdownTimer.description: Show a slider (light bulb) to control the auto shutdown timer for the light.

motorControl.title: Motor control service
motorControl.description: Show motor control switches which allow to control the curtains.

motorReverseControl.title: Motor reverse control service
motorReverseControl.description: Show a switch which allows to quickly reverse the motor.

heaterControl.title: Heater control service
heaterControl.description: Show a switch which allows to quickly enable the heater.

pm25Breakpoints.title: Pm25 breakpoints
pm25Breakpoints.description: Define a custom array of pm25 breakpoints. Provide an array with exactly 4 unique numbers.

items.title: Ceiling Fan specific settings
items.description: Configure ceiling fan specific device settings.

items.title: Air Purifier specific settings
items.description: Configure air purifier specific device settings.
